name: quantity_unit_ortho
description: Orthographic normalization of the quantity unit

name: source_bdc
description: 0 : the quantity unit is present in the Balance du Commerce data

name: nbr_bdc_quantity_unit
description: Number of times the quantity unit is present in the Balance du Commerce data

name: nbr_bdc_quantity_unit_ortho
description: Number of times the orthographic normalization of the quantity unit is present in the Balance du Commerce data

name: nbr_bdc_quantity_unit_ajustees
description: Number of times the simplified quantity unit is present in the Balance du Commerce data

name: q_conv
description: Conversion ratio between the simplified quantity unit and u_conv (1*quantity_unit_ajustees = q_conv*u_conv)

name: incertitude_unit
description: 1 if we know u_conv and q_conv associated with quantity_unit_ajustees

name: source_hambourg
description: 0 : the quantity unit is present in the Hamburg data

name: needs_more_details
description: 0 : the name of the quantity unit is enough to find u_conv and q_conv ; 1 : we need the goods and/or the location
